sentences.english: So with that said, scary voice Number Two.
sentences.chinese: 基于上面所说的，第二个令人提心吊胆的声音。

sentences.english: The grafter was haunted by the fear of being discovered.
sentences.chinese: 那个受贿人因怕被人发觉而经常提心吊胆。

sentences.english: Most of the men waiting were pulling nervously on cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 大部分等待的人都在提心吊胆地猛抽香烟。

sentences.english: Forget this Goddamn business of worrying about our flanks.
sentences.chinese: 忘掉这种提心吊胆防护侧翼的混账事儿。

sentences.english: He was on tenterhooks about the result of the exam.
sentences.chinese: 他对考试结果感到提心吊胆的。

sentences.english: That was the most dangerous photo I have taken, it was pretty scary.
sentences.chinese: 这是拍摄途中最危险的一次，拍摄的时候我提心吊胆。

sentences.english: Silently waiting in the forgotten corners, for me to be always on tenterhooks.
sentences.chinese: 默默的守候在被我遗忘的角落，为我提心吊胆。

sentences.english: Readers, have you had experiences when you were on tenterhooks, struggling to deal with the unknown?
sentences.chinese: 读者们，你们是否有提心吊胆，惴惴不安的经历呢？

sentences.english: In there they peered out the window fearfully at the ivy vine.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他们提心吊胆地窥视着窗外的常青藤。

sentences.english: No wonder people thing clowns are scary.
sentences.chinese: 难怪人的事情会使小丑虾提心吊胆。

sentences.english: On the face of it, becoming an entrepreneur can sound scary.
sentences.chinese: 乍看起来，成为一名创业者可能令人提心吊胆。

sentences.english: I waited, on tenterhooks, for Uncle Jack to tell Atticus my side of it.
sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地等着杰克叔叔告诉阿迪克斯我的理由。

sentences.english: A wrongdoer is constantly haunted by fear of discovery.
sentences.chinese: 做坏事的人经常提心吊胆，因为怕被人发觉。

sentences.english: These are things that are scary in our ancestral environment.
sentences.chinese: 有东西让我们的祖先提心吊胆。

sentences.english: Better pass a danger once, than be always in fear.
sentences.chinese: 冒一次险，胜过时时提心吊胆。
